Post.Title: Introduction to LiteBlog BlogEngine
Post.Author: Admin
Post.Content:
LiteBlog is a light weight blog engine designed to help integrate a blog into your existing .Net website. To get started, you can do the following steps:

  • Login to the Admin portal using username: Admin, password: admin
  • Change the username to your name. Login back and change password.
  • Compose posts using the Compose link

The entire source code of the blog is available for your use. You can extend it and use it as you wish. Some of the features of the blog include:

  • Entire blog is stored as XML (including user profiles and membership)
  • Native XML support
  • Composing documents using RichEdit controls
  • Uploading documents and images
  • Comments moderation
  • Labeling or Category management
  • Archive management
  • Good use of AJAX features
  • Good publishing features
  • Extensive use of application caching
  • XML Layer is abstracted as good interface

Thanks for checking out LiteBlog.
